title: BTC Dips Below $67k as Bearish Sentiment Prevails
summary: Bitcoin is trading around $66,075, having fallen below the $67,000 support level. Market sentiment is currently bearish, driven by a slowdown in retail trading and broader TradFi selloffs. However, institutional moves like BlackRock's DeFi expansion and SkyBridge's dip-buying suggest long-term confidence.
prediction: Short-term Bearish / Consolidation. Expect testing of lower support levels if $66k fails to hold.
